name: ZUT COIN DASH
description:
Fun game for a cryptocurrency I am invested in. To learn more visit

www.zeroutility.com

This game only works on windows desktop currently click or touch screen to jump. I can make it available for mobile release if enough people play!

To play download the Zutcoindash3.1 Zip file. Once it is downloaded click into the file to find the application. Double click into the ZUTCOIN application to play. You may receive a warning from Microsoft about an unknown publisher, It happened for me the first time too and I made the game. Just hit okay extract all the files. Click the application again and it should be able to run after the files are extracted. After that there is no more install. You can make a short cut for it or drag and drop the application for easy access. Thank you!
